metadata.title: CVE-2020-18976 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow in Tcpreplay v4.3.2 allows attackers to cause a Denial ofService via the 'do_checksum' function in 'checksum.c'. It can be triggeredby sending a crafted pcap file to the 'tcpreplay-edit' binary. This issueis different than CVE-2019-8381.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
